title: 252.46 PAYMENT RATES.
text:
[Repealed, 2013 c 108 art 13 s 14]
The commissioner shall establish a statewide rate-setting methodology for all day training and habilitation services as provided under section 256B.4914. The rate-setting methodology must abide by the principles of transparency and equitability across the state. The methodology must involve a uniform process of structuring rates for each service and must promote quality and participant choice.
[Repealed, 2013 c 108 art 13 s 14]
